adrFormatAddress: 29 Cooper St Ste 1A, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text: My first checkup and cleaning at Evydent Dentistry made a great first impression on me the other day. The office staff who I dealt with in setting up the appointment and who greeted me in person on the day of the appointment were nice, professional and efficient. I was seen immediately with barely any wait at all. The X-ray tech and hygienist were both gentle and thorough and Dr Evy was nice and seems thorough and competent. I felt like I was in good, skillful hands throughout. Also, it’s a beautifully designed office. Everything is bright, tidy and well-maintained. I had been long overdue for a checkup and it’s always a little stressful to begin with a new dentist / dental practice. It can be uncomfortable and painful getting dental procedures, especially for those like me who have a low pain-threshold. Dr Evy was sensitive to this and communicated proactively at each stage, responding to my feedback about discomfort immediately with the appropriate measures. It’s such a relief to have gotten all the needed work outlined and to have started immediately on the day of my checkup with half of the planned work. The only tiny negative is that I had to remind the tech that I hadn’t gotten one item (fluoride treatment) done that we had intended to do; but they immediately rectified the situation and got it done before I left. I will be going back soon for the other half of the planned work, and I feel confident that it will go well based on how the first appointment went. It’s good to be back on track and up to date with my dental care and to have found a dental-care-resource that fits my needs.

originalText.text: I recently had my first dental appointment at Evydent Dentistry, and I couldn't be more pleased with the experience. The moment I walked in, I was struck by the place's cleanliness and the state-of-the-art technology they use. The attention to detail in explaining everything I needed for my treatment plan was impressive. I highly recommend Evydent Dentistry for anyone seeking dental care.

text.text: I recently had my first dental appointment at Evydent Dentistry, and I couldn't be more pleased with the experience. The moment I walked in, I was struck by the place's cleanliness and the state-of-the-art technology they use. The attention to detail in explaining everything I needed for my treatment plan was impressive. I highly recommend Evydent Dentistry for anyone seeking dental care.

originalText.text: Evy and her team are amazing. Very welcoming and helpful. They took care of an emergency tooth situation for me next day. I HIGHLY recommend giving them a try if you can.

text.text: Evy and her team are amazing. Very welcoming and helpful. They took care of an emergency tooth situation for me next day. I HIGHLY recommend giving them a try if you can.

originalText.text: Everyone there is nice and professional, and the space is clean and comfortable. I can not think of anything to complain about honestly. The communication both at the location and correspondence when I’m at home is great. Everything is explained well and everyone is understanding and helpful. They are maintain a pleasant environment all around at Evydent

originalText.text:
I would highly recommend this dentist, I have always had a phobia with dentists since childhood and today I feel like my phobia disappeared.
I felt at ease from the moment I picked up the phone to make the appointment.
I have never had a dentist like Dr Evy she sat with me for a long time  and made a detailed treatment plan explaining everything in detail and  addressed all my issues.
The price for my treatment plan was so much less then what I was expecting.
I left feeling very confident and happy that I too will have a beautiful smile.
The staff were so lovely.
Thank you.
